373	as	O

374	That	O

374	industry	O
374	,	O

374	has	O

375	certainly	S_knowledge

375	.	O

376	In	O

376	companies	O

376	to	O

376	among	O
376	the	O

376	energy	O

376	2012	O
376	.	O

377	Belgian	O
377	industry	O
377	is	O

377	covenants	O
377	because	O
377	it	O
377	is	O
377	afraid	O
377	that	O

377	absolute	O
377	limit	O
377	would	S_world
